org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.bridge.spi

Class Elasticsearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.bridge.spi.Elasticsearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldMetadataCreationContext

    public class Elasticsearch
extends Object
implements FieldMetadataCreationContext
    Extends FieldMetadataCreationContext allowing the user to define additional properties for a field specific to Elasticsearch.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto
    Experimental
    This contract is currently under active development and may be altered in future releases,

      • field

        public FieldMetadataCreationContext field(String name,
                                          FieldType type)
        Description copied from interface: FieldMetadataCreationContext
        Adds a field to the list of all meta-data.
        Specified by:
        field in interface FieldMetadataCreationContext
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the field
        type - The type of the field; The type of the field created in FieldBridge.set(String, Object, org.apache.lucene.document.Document, org.hibernate.search.bridge.LuceneOptions) must match the type declared for the field here.
        Returns:
        a context object for fluent API invocations

        Parameters:

        Gives access to properties that are specific to an indexing technology.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
